channel.title: Verox has style [Ep 1]
channel.description:
This is my first black ops 2 episode for any information look at the description. i hope you enjoy liking and sharing the video helps out a lot thank you.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RRERi-cK0fQ&feature=youtu.be

item.title: Verox has style [Ep 1]
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

I still don’t see your point for complaining besides the fact that you hate it. There are plenty of other games out there that don’t include quickscoping, play them.

Read full topic

item.title: Verox has style [Ep 1]
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:11, topic:524013”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=642555.msg4327376#msg4327376 date=1373160474]
I hate it when people do shit like this with snipers. Go try that in real life and record it, I want to see it. Whoever created quick scoping should die. Snipers are meant to be in the back and blending in with the surrounding area so they are hidden. Not jumping off buildings, spinning and ‘hoping’ to get a kill whenever they shoot, and running into the main battle area. As for the video, use music that bounces and doesn’t put people to sleep.
[/quote]
No. It’s a game and I would expect unrealistic things from it. If you want realistic then do everyone a service and join your countries army, not complain about realism through a game.[/quote]
I understand that it’s a game and unrealistic things are going to be in it, but quick scoping is just down right stupid. It basically creates a weapon that is usually a 1 shot kill from all distances (Short, medium, and long) which is unfair. As for joining the army, not all people are capable of endurance (Not saying that I’m fat, because I’m not). And since the topic is sniping, 20/20 vision is required (Either natural or surgery) and since you’re pointing your finger at me, I can’t become a sniper because I wear glasses and I don’t have a couple grand to wave around for surgery.

Read full topic

item.title: Verox has style [Ep 1]
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

I hate it when people do shit like this with snipers. Go try that in real life and record it, I want to see it. Whoever created quick scoping should die. Snipers are meant to be in the back and blending in with the surrounding area so they are hidden. Not jumping off buildings, spinning and ‘hoping’ to get a kill whenever they shoot, and running into the main battle area. As for the video, use music that bounces and doesn’t put people to sleep.

No. It’s a game and I would expect unrealistic things from it. If you want realistic then do everyone a service and join your countries army, not complain about realism through a game.

Read full topic
